PHRASE.LANG: Some of Lucy's eggs are particularly special to her and you helped keep them safe. Here's a very special egg of your own - keep it warm and it's bound to hatch! [#Legal]
Certains des œufs de Lucie sont spéciaux à ses yeux et vous l'avez aidée à les garder en sécurité. Voici un œuf spécial pour toi. Garde-le au chaud, il est prêt à éclore ! [#Legal]
Einige Eier von Lucy sind ihr ganz besonders wichtig, und du hast sie gerettet. Dies ist ein ganz besonderes Ei nur für dich - halte es warm und es wird irgendwann schlüpfen! [#Legal]
Alcune uova di Lucy sono particolarmente speciali per lei e tu l'hai aiutata a proteggerle. Ecco un uovo molto speciale tutto per te. Tienilo al caldo e prima o poi si schiuderà! [#Legal]
Algunos huevos de Lucy son particularmente especiales para ella y tú la ayudaste a protegerlos. Este huevo tan especial es para ti, ¡mantenlo calentito y seguro que eclosiona! [#Legal]
ルーシーが産む幾つかの卵の中には大変貴重な物も混じっています。大切に扱えばいつか孵化するかも！？ [#Legal]
루시가 특별히 소중하게 생각했던 알들을 안전하게 지켜주신 당신에게 드립니다. 따듯하게 품어 주시면 언젠가는 부화할 겁니다![#Legal]
Some of Lucy's eggs are particularly special to her and you helped keep them safe. Here's a very special egg of your own - keep it warm and it's bound to hatch! [#Legal]
露西特別寶貝某些蛋，既然你把這些蛋保住了，當然特別的蛋給特別的你。只要好好保溫就能孵出驚喜！ [#Legal]
露西特別寶貝某些蛋，既然你把這些蛋保住了，當然特別的蛋給特別的你。只要好好保溫就能孵出驚喜！ [#Legal]
Some of Lucy's eggs are particularly special to her and you helped keep them safe. Here's a very special egg of your own - keep it warm and it's bound to hatch! [#Legal]
